device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
contribution_desc:
This information retrieval paper studies information seeking behaviours in cross-device (smartphone-desktop) web search and evaluates an algorithm which predicts document relevance based on mobile touch interactions for search continuation on desktop.

Contribution: "cross-device interaction" -> "study" -> "usage patterns" -> "cross-device web search"
